      • checkImmunity

        public static boolean checkImmunity(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                    CommandArgs args,
                    int index)
        Check the if the player have the right to execute the command on the other player
        Parameters:
        sender - the one who want to do the command
        args - containing the name of the target
        index - index of the target's name in the argument
        Returns:
        true if the sender have the right to execute the command, else false with displaying an error message to the sender.

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Player getUserParam(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                    CommandArgs args,
                                    String permNode)
                                             throws PlayerNotFound,
                                                    ActionNotPermitedException
        Get the user using the -P param as indicating the userName and check who launched the command.

        sender - sender of the command
        args - argument of the command
        permNode - permission to run the command
        Returns:
        target player if found
        Throws:
        PlayerNotFound - if the target player is not found
        ActionNotPermitedException - if the player don't have the permission

        Throws:
        PlayerNotFound - if the target player is not found

        public static int timeParser(String toParse)
                      throws NotANumberException
        Parse the given string to get the time in an integer it's in the format :
        Parameters:
        toParse - time to parse
        Returns:
